column5: Hello all, me and my family are heading to Bay of Quinte on October 16th. It is our first time up there and have no idea where to start or what to use. We are staying on Picton Bay. Also wondering whether the big ones will be in there this early? Any help would be appreciated. Thanks!

Hello all, me and my family are heading to Bay of Quinte on October 16th. It is our first time up there and have no idea where to start or what to use. We are staying on Picton Bay. Also wondering whether the big ones will be in there this early? Any help would be appreciated. Thanks!
Try these two websites - they should be helpful...http://www.quintefishing.com/http://www.fish-hawk.net Good luck - get some Rapala Deep Tail Dancers - with purple on it... Smitty
Try these two websites - they should be helpful...http://www.quintefishing.com/http://www.fish-hawk.net Good luck - get some Rapala Deep Tail Dancers - with purple on it... Smitty
Reef Runners, Manns Stretch 20's, These are all deep diving lures. Best to have rod holders and Planer boards. Ohhh have some STRONG rods and line counters too. good luck
